item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Playable Counter-Strike Diffusion World Model (trained on 2x4090, 5M frames) (72 points | 16 comments)
2. WordPress.org's latest move involves taking control of a WP Engine plugin (140 points | 90 comments)
3. 1 bug, $50k in bounties, a Zendesk backdoor (1245 points | 357 comments)
4. Exploring Typst, a new typesetting system similar to LaTeX (357 points | 120 comments)
5. Can logic programming be liberated from predicates and backtracking? [pdf] (93 points | 15 comments)
6. Omni SenseVoice: High-Speed Speech Recognition with Words Timestamps (67 points | 17 comments)
7. Two never-before-seen tools, from same group, infect air-gapped devices (175 points | 126 comments)
8. Eating less can lead to a longer life: study in mice shows why (12 points | 4 comments)
9. Lessons from Plain Text (28 points | 14 comments)
10. Every bug/quirk of the Windows resource compiler (rc.exe), probably (134 points | 13 comments)
11. Show HN: AOO – C++ library for real-time audio streaming and messaging (71 points | 10 comments)
12. FLUX is fast and it's open source (155 points | 68 comments)
13. Turkish language has a gossip tense (192 points | 158 comments)
14. Germany's 49-euro ticket resulted in significant shift from road to rail (554 points | 542 comments)
15. Heart rate variability differs between smartwatch and clinical testing (38 points | 24 comments)
16. Pepsi's Soviet Navy (2021) (3 points | discuss)
17. Washington's 'forgotten giant' volcano stirs (46 points | 18 comments)
18. How I animate 3Blue1Brown [video] (767 points | 155 comments)
19. DuckStation (156 points | 53 comments)
20. Hammer Looking for a Nail, AI Drone Looking for Business Case (25 points | 19 comments)
21. The unreasonable effectiveness of plasmid sequencing as a service (8 points | 1 comment)
22. The 1/8th Sleep (118 points | 25 comments)
23. Lake Michigan Stonehenge – What have researchers learned? (73 points | 32 comments)
24. Entropy Explained, with Sheep (2016) (46 points | 17 comments)
25. Psilocybin bests SSRI for major depression in first long-term comparison (485 points | 317 comments)
26. The Explore vs. Exploit Dilemma (33 points | 7 comments)
27. Some Notes on Upgrading Hugo (27 points | 9 comments)
28. Gödel Agent: A self-referential agent framework for recursive self-improvement (55 points | 21 comments)
29. Starship Flight 5 license issued by FAA (235 points | 199 comments)
30. Firepad – An embeddable open-source collaborative code and text editor for web (7 points | 1 comment)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
